department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Transport Canada has a requirement for one (1) BrightDrop Zevo 600 electric van.
full_summary:
####### Tender Announcement: Electric Van for Transport Canada #########

### Tender Details ###

* **Tender Title**: Solicitation B BrightDrop Zevo 600 Electric Van
* **Solicitation Reference Number**: WS4556102593
* **Publication Date**: July 12, 2024
* **Closing Date**: July 23, 2024, 14:00:00

### Contract Overview ###

Transport Canada requires one (1) BrightDrop Zevo 600 electric van for its operations. This is a procurement for authorized resellers only. The contract is expected to start from June 27, 2024.

### Mediation and Trade Agreements ###

This tender is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contracting Entity Information ###

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

### Contact Information ###

For any queries or concerns, please contact:

* Sarah Maroun (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [sarah.maroun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:sarah.maroun@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)


### Additional Information ###

You can find the full tender details and requirements at the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20306938?extsite=MjAzMDY5MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
